LockHowl:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
LockHowl:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

LockHowl:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
LockHowl:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
LockHowl:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

LockHowl:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
LockHowl:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

LockHowl:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
LockHowl:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !LockHowl:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

LockHowl:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
LockHowl:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !LockHowl:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

LockHowl:Singe.NAME: Singe
LockHowl:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! poison. Deal damage equal to poison.

LockHowl:Shape.NAME: Lethal Shape
LockHowl:Shape.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade an attack in your hand and exhaust it. Exhaust.

LockHowl:Horn.NAME: Inspiring Horn
LockHowl:Horn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Increase the Strength of this card by 1 this combat.

LockHowl:Replenish.NAME: Replenish Blood
LockHowl:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and heal !M! for each time you lost health this turn. ( !LockHowl:SecondMagic! times )

LockHowl:Nurture.NAME: Nurture
LockHowl:Nurture.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard 1 card. NL Next turn, gain {!M!|-1,1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|4=[E] [E] [E] [E]|5=[E] [E] [E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and draw !LockHowl:SecondMagic! cards.

LockHowl:Opportunity.NAME: Opportunity
LockHowl:Opportunity.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add !M! Shiv{!M!|>1=s} to your hand.

LockHowl:Flask.NAME: Flask Drop
LockHowl:Flask.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Discard 1 card at random.

LockHowl:Malfunction.NAME: Malfunction
LockHowl:Malfunction.DESCRIPTION: Evoke ALL of your Orbs. Channel 1 Acid for each Orb Evoked.

LockHowl:Hesitation.NAME: Hesitation
LockHowl:Hesitation.DESCRIPTION: Burden. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

LockHowl:Palm.NAME: Palm Deflection
LockHowl:Palm.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark to each enemy. NL Gain !M! Block for each enemy.

LockHowl:Delve.NAME: Delve Destiny
LockHowl:Delve.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Scry !M!. Whenever this card is Retained, increase Scry by 1 until played.

LockHowl:Explosive.NAME: Plant Explosives
LockHowl:Explosive.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Rigged. Add a Detonator to your discard pile.
LockHowl:Explosive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Rigged. Add a Detonator to your draw pile.

LockHowl:Detonator.NAME: Detonate
LockHowl:Detonator.DESCRIPTION: Deal ALL enemies damage equal to their Rigged. NL Exhaust.

LockHowl:Psycho.NAME: Demonic Voices
LockHowl:Psycho.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Inner Demons. Add a Release to your discard pile.

LockHowl:Release.NAME: Release
LockHowl:Release.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Inner Demons to a random enemy.

LockHowl:Flash.NAME: Flashbang
LockHowl:Flash.DESCRIPTION: If a non-boss, non-elite enemy intends to attack, apply 1 Stun to it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The target does not intend to attack.
